black::里根.reason: In most context, the name doesn't make sense, so want default

black::中的.reason: I've never seen it used in this way... makes smore sense to just be default

black::一生.reason: both words are correct for pinyin by default. 一生还 should be 一(生还)

black::万年.english: Wannian county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
black::万年.reason: We don't really care about the county, so we want default

black::到了.reason: We really don't need this... want the default

black::面的.english: abbr. of 麵包車的士|面包车的士[mian4 bao1 che1 di1 shi4]/minivan taxi
black::面的.reason: we probably won't see this at all, so we want default

black::就正.english: (literary and deferential) to solicit comments (on one's writing)

black::一声.english: first tone in Mandarin (high, level tone)
black::一声.reason: We don't really care about tones, a single sound seems more common

black::明治.english: Meiji, Japanese era name, corresponding to the reign (1868-1912) of the Meiji emperor

black::在野.english: to be out of (political) office/to be out of power
black::在野.reason: don't think we see this often, so we want it to be separate

black::地质.reason: 地质问 is more common, so... separate until further notice. Used in 三体

black::人居.reason: 两人居然 is possible, so... separate would be better. Human habitat is also a bit weird.
